TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityPreviewDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 在预览栏中显示子活动设计器的集合；如果在预览栏中选择了子设计器，则会在工作流设计图面上以预览模式或编辑模式显示选定的活动设计器。

span.span: Displays a collection of child activity designers in a preview strip and, when a child designer is selected on the preview strip, displays the selected activity designer in preview or edit mode on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 是一个顺序活动设计器，该设计器在其设计图面顶部出现的栏中显示它的所有子活动设计器。 is a sequential activity designer that displays all of its child activity designers in a strip that appears at the top of its design surface. 选择了其中一个子设计器时，其表示形式将显示在栏下方由活动预览设计器承载的预览窗口中。When one of the child designers is selected, its representation is displayed in a preview window that the activity preview designer hosts below the strip. 具有预览模式和编辑模式。The has a preview mode and an edit mode. 使用预览模式时，用户不需要滚动就可以查看选定设计器的完整表示形式；不过，用户在预览模式下不能修改选定的活动设计器，Preview mode allows the user to view the entire representation of the selected designer without scrolling; however, preview mode does not allow the user to modify the selected activity designer. 而在编辑模式时则可以。Edit mode allows the user to modify the selected activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 属性以插入 的自定义谓词操作。The following example demonstrates how to override the property to insert custom verb actions for a . `CreateActivityVerbs` 创建一个名为 的新 `"Add New Parallel Branch"`，并将它与名为 `OnAddParallelBranch` 的事件处理程序关联。The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`. 在工作流设计器中单击该谓词时，即会调用该事件处理程序。When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#73](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#73)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#73](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#73)]
